name: MultipleReturnToSender+
author: fidele007
description:
Good old MultipleReturnToSender, but cooler. Send message by pressing multiple Return keys.
Supported apps/tweaks: Couria, Messages app (In-app composer and Quick Reply), Telegram app and Viber app.

0.0.1-50: Fixed bug where inserting white spaces also send message
0.0.1-85: NEW: Option to change Return key to Send key just before the final Return key to send message
0.0.1-194: Finally fixed the settings sync bug by Saving Changes on Respring
